thread.title: Graham D'Aucourt
thread.title_full: CORGI HomePlan reviewed by Graham D'Aucourt

author: Graham D'Aucourt
title: Graham D'Aucourt
text: My problem was dealt with quickly and efficiently. An engineer called within 10-15 minutes, and was with me within another 15 minutes. He stopped the leak and shut off the radiator, then returned on Tuesday morning (Monday being a bank holiday) with a new radiator which was fitted by lunchtime.
